episodeTitle: The Worst in the World! A Scientist of Terror - Caesar!
episodeTitleJapanese: 世界最悪 恐怖の科学者シーザー
episodeTitleRomanized: Sekai Saiaku - Kyōfu no Kagakusha Shīzā
description: Caesar Clown is fully revealed as the mastermind behind Punk Hazard's destruction. Brownbeard tells the story of how Caesar saved the prisoners, while Smoker uncovers the dark truth about Caesar's experiments and the island's tragic past.

events.title: Punk Hazard's Tragic Past Revealed
events.description: Brownbeard recounts how Punk Hazard was once a lush, green island before a catastrophic chemical weapons experiment went wrong four years ago. The explosion vaporized two-thirds of the island and released poisonous gas that paralyzed prisoners.
events.significance: Establishes the dark history of Punk Hazard and sets up the revelation of Caesar's involvement.

quotes.text: Four years ago, this island was lush and green before Vegapunk's chemical weapons experiment went catastrophically wrong.
quotes.speaker: Brownbeard

events.title: Caesar Positioned as Savior
events.description: Brownbeard explains how Caesar Clown arrived on the island, purified the poisonous air, and provided mechanical prosthetics to the paralyzed prisoners. The prisoners became devoted followers, believing Caesar saved them.
events.significance: Reveals Caesar's deception - positioning himself as a savior to manipulate the prisoners into becoming test subjects.

events.title: The Worst Generation Revealed to Straw Hats
events.description: Brownbeard informs the Straw Hat Pirates that due to the incident at Sabaody Archipelago two years ago, the eleven rookies present then plus Blackbeard are now known to others as 'the Worst Generation'.
events.significance: Formalizes the concept of the Worst Generation to the Straw Hats and establishes their place in the pirate world hierarchy.

quotes.text: Two years ago, due to the incident that happened on Sabaody Archipelago, the eleven rookies present then and Blackbeard are now known to others as 'the Worst Generation'.
quotes.speaker: Brownbeard
quotes.context: Explaining the Worst Generation to the Straw Hats

events.title: Law and Brownbeard's Medical Connection
events.description: Brownbeard reveals that Trafalgar Law used his surgical abilities to attach living animal legs onto the paralyzed prisoners, enabling them to walk again as centaurs.
events.significance: Shows Law's role in the Punk Hazard situation and his medical capabilities with the Ope Ope no Mi.

events.title: Smoker Reveals Caesar's True Crime
events.description: Vice Admiral Smoker reveals to his G-5 Marines that Caesar Clown was actually responsible for creating the weapon and causing the explosion that destroyed Punk Hazard four years ago.
events.significance: Exposes Caesar as a mass murderer and the true villain of Punk Hazard, not a savior.

quotes.text: Caesar Clown was actually responsible for creating the weapon and causing the explosion that destroyed Punk Hazard.
quotes.speaker: Smoker
quotes.context: Revealing Caesar's crimes to the G-5 Marines

events.title: Marine Conspiracy and Child Abductions
events.description: Smoker suspects a mole within the Marines' G-5 base is covering up Caesar's crimes, particularly child abductions that were mislabeled as accidents or pirate activity.
events.significance: Reveals corruption within the Marines and Caesar's ongoing criminal activities involving children.

quotes.text: Don't expect too much from the Marines. As long as it consists of a group of people, there is no organisation that is perfect.
quotes.speaker: Smoker
quotes.context: Warning his men about Marine corruption

events.title: Caesar Clown's Full Character Reveal
events.description: Caesar Clown is shown in full detail for the first time, displaying his flamboyant personality and demented nature as he interacts with a dying soldier, asking symptom-related questions while giggling.
events.significance: Fully introduces the main antagonist of the Punk Hazard arc, establishing him as a genuinely evil and sadistic scientist.

events.title: Caesar Murders His Patient
events.description: Caesar Clown kills a centaur soldier with poisonous gas after treating him as a test subject for his experiments, demonstrating his complete lack of empathy and his deadly gas abilities.
events.significance: Demonstrates Caesar's evil nature and his willingness to murder his own followers for his experiments.

events.title: Caesar's Connection to 'Joker'
events.description: Caesar Clown receives permission from a mysterious contact called 'Joker' to eliminate the intruders on Punk Hazard, with Joker promising to make it seem like just another accident at sea.
events.significance: Reveals Caesar's connection to a higher power (Doflamingo) and foreshadows the larger criminal network involved.

quotes.text: Joker will make it seem as though it is just another accident at sea.
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown
quotes.context: After receiving permission to kill the intruders

events.title: Caesar Orders Capture of Intruders
events.description: Caesar Clown gives the order to capture the intruders (Straw Hats and Marines) on Punk Hazard, wanting to use them as guinea pigs for his experiments.
events.significance: Sets up the conflict for the Punk Hazard arc with Caesar actively hunting the protagonists.

events.title: Caesar's Ambition to Surpass Vegapunk
events.description: Caesar reveals his ambition to surpass Dr. Vegapunk and become the world's greatest scientist through his deadly chemical weapons experiments.
events.significance: Establishes Caesar's motivation and his rivalry with Vegapunk, the Marines' chief scientist.

quotes.text: I'll be the best scientist the world has ever known and surpass Vegapunk himself.
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown

events.title: Law Presents Smoker's Heart
events.description: Trafalgar Law presents Smoker's heart in a box as an 'apology gift', demonstrating his surgical abilities and tactical advantage over the Vice Admiral.
events.significance: Shows Law's power over Smoker and his strategic thinking in the alliance situation.

quotes.text: Don't expect too much from the Marines. As long as it consists of a group of people, there is no organisation that is perfect.
quotes.speaker: Smoker
quotes.context: Warning his men about Marine corruption

quotes.text: Two years ago, due to the incident that happened on Sabaody Archipelago, the eleven rookies present then and Blackbeard are now known to others as 'the Worst Generation'.
quotes.speaker: Brownbeard
quotes.context: Explaining the Worst Generation to the Straw Hats

quotes.text: I'll be the best scientist the world has ever known and surpass Vegapunk himself.
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown

themes.description: Caesar Clown positioned himself as a savior to the prisoners while secretly using them as test subjects for his deadly experiments.
themes.symbolism: The contrast between Caesar's outward appearance as a helper and his true nature as a mass murderer.

themes.description: The episode explores the dark side of scientific advancement through Caesar's unethical experiments and his obsession with surpassing Vegapunk.
themes.symbolism: Caesar represents science without morality, willing to sacrifice lives for his ambitions.

themes.description: Smoker acknowledges that even the Marines, as an organization, are imperfect and susceptible to corruption.
themes.symbolism: The Marine mole covering up child abductions represents systemic failure.

characterSpotlights.development: Caesar is fully revealed as a mad scientist conducting deadly experiments on Punk Hazard. His flamboyant yet sadistic personality is established.
keyActions: Murders a patient with poisonous gas
Receives permission from Joker to kill intruders
Orders capture of Straw Hats and Marines as guinea pigs
quotes: I'll be the best scientist the world has ever known and surpass Vegapunk himself.

characterSpotlights.development: Smoker demonstrates independent thinking and moral integrity by exposing Caesar's crimes and acknowledging Marine corruption.
keyActions: Reveals Caesar caused the Punk Hazard explosion
Suspects Marine mole covering up child abductions
Warns his men about organizational imperfection
quotes: Don't expect too much from the Marines. As long as it consists of a group of people, there is no organisation that is perfect.

characterSpotlights.development: Brownbeard serves as the narrator for Punk Hazard's history and Caesar's deceptive rescue.
keyActions: Recounts the island's destruction four years ago
Explains Caesar's role as apparent savior
Informs Straw Hats about the Worst Generation

mangaDifferences.difference: The episode covers Chapter 664, pages 3-19, with standard anime pacing and expansion.

trivia.fact: This is the last episode to feature 'We Go!' by Hiroshi Kitadani as the opening theme.
This is the final episode to feature the prologue about Gold Roger's execution in the opening sequence.
Caesar Clown's voice actor Ryūsei Nakao also voiced Frieza in Dragon Ball Z, bringing similar energy to the character.
The episode aired in the US one day before Japan due to simulcast timing.
